title: Speciality restaurants plans big push in three years
description: Speciality Restaurants, India's first publicly listed restaurant company, plans to open 40-50 new outlets in the next three years. The expansion will focus on its Mainland China and Oh! Calcutta brands, both in India and abroad. Currently, the company operates 97 restaurant outlets and 32 confectionery outlets.
